name: R5-SubstancePolymer-R4-SubstancePolymer
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 SubstancePolymer into FHIR R4

element.display: Properties of a substance specific to it being a polymer

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer`

element.display: Overall type of the polymer

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.class` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.class`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.contained`

element.display: Descrtibes the copolymer sequence type (polymer connectivity)

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.copolymerConnectivity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.copolymerConnectivity`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Polymer geometry, e.g. linear, branched, cross-linked, network or dendritic

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.geometry` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.geometry`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.id`

element.display: A business idenfier for this polymer, but typically this is handled by a SubstanceDefinition identifier
A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.meta`

element.display: Todo - this is intended to connect to a repeating full modification structure, also used by Protein and Nucleic Acid . String is just a placeholder

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.modification` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.modification` - modification changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Todo

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Captures the type of ratio to the entire polymer, e.g. Monomer/Polymer ratio, SRU/Polymer Ratio

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.ratioType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.ratioType`

element.display: The starting materials - monomer(s) used in the synthesis of the polymer

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial`

element.display: A percentage

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.amount` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 amount Quantity has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 amount
R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.type`
R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.material`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.id`

element.display: Used to specify whether the attribute described is a defining element for the unique identification of the polymer

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.isDefining` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.isDefining`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Specifies and quantifies the repeated units and their configuration

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat`

element.display: A representation of an (average) molecular formula from a polymer

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.averageMolecularFormula` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.averageMolecularFormula`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: An SRU - Structural Repeat Unit

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit`
R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.amount` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.numberOfUnits`

element.display: Applies to homopolymer and block co-polymers where the degree of polymerisation within a block can be described

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation`

R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.average` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 average integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 amount

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.high` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 high integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 amount

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.id`

R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.low` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 low integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 amount

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation.degree`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.orientation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.orientationOfPolymerisation`

element.display: A graphical structure for this SRU

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation`

element.display: An attached file with the structural representation

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation.attachment` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation.attachment` - attachment has change due to type change: R5 `attachment` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `attachment`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.structuralRepresentation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: The format of the representation e.g. InChI, SMILES, MOLFILE, CDX, SDF, PDB, mmCIF
